tasks.title: Setup Claude Code Integration
tasks.description: Integrate Claude Code CLI tool into Enostics endpoints
tasks.details: Create API wrapper for Claude Code CLI tool, implement session management, and add security sandboxing.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with sample code requests and verify proper isolation

tasks.title: Create Task Master API Endpoints
tasks.description: Build REST API endpoints for Task Master functionality
tasks.details: Implement /api/ai/tasks endpoints, add authentication middleware, integrate with existing user system.
tasks.testStrategy: API testing with Postman and integration tests

tasks.title: Dashboard UI Integration
tasks.description: Add AI tools section to Enostics dashboard
tasks.details: Create new Dev Studio section, add real-time session viewer, integrate with existing dashboard components.
tasks.testStrategy: Manual UI testing and user acceptance testing

subtasks.title: Create Dev Studio Layout
subtasks.description: Design and implement the main layout for AI tools
subtasks.details: Use existing dashboard patterns, add navigation tabs for Code and Tasks
subtasks.testStrategy: Visual testing across different screen sizes

subtasks.title: Add Real-time Session Viewer
subtasks.description: Show live coding sessions and task updates
subtasks.details: WebSocket integration for real-time updates, display session status and logs
